item.title: Pipeline Processor
item.author: sohasoham811@gmail.com (Soham Tripathy)
item.description: Jan-May 2022 | This is a simulator model for the five stage pipeline processor built in c++. Developed a C++ simulation of a single-level Cache, offering Random, LRU, and Pseudo LRU replacement policies. Created a 5-stage Scalar Pipelined processor based on RISC Architecture, leveraging multithreading for parallel stage execution and improved overall performance.
